participant_1.background:
I eat my feelings.
I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best.
i like spreading laughter and love everywhere i go.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

participant_2.background:
My smartphone is my most valued material possession because it is an essential tool for my life
I am a student and a part-time bartender to help pay for my studies.
I focus on my personal growth and don't feel the need to share it with others.
i have woman calling me all the time.
i can t live without my friends.

content.text: Good morning to you, how are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm a student and a part-time bartender to help pay for my studies.
That sounds like a lot of work, but also very rewarding! What do you study?
I am studying computer science. I love working with computers and learning about new technologies.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great things in the future.
Thank you! I appreciate that. What do you do for a living?
I am a writer. I love telling stories and sharing my thoughts with the world.
That's great! I love to read, so I'm sure I'll enjoy your work.
Thank you! I'm always working on new things, so I'll let you know when I have something published.
I look forward to it! I'm sure it will be great.
Thanks! I hope so too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to play video games and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds fun! I also love to play video games.
It's a great way to relax and have fun.
I agree! What are some of your favorite games?
I love playing role-playing games, like Skyrim and The Witcher.
I've never played those games, but they sound interesting.
They're both really great games. You should check them out!
I will! I'm always looking for new games to play.
